title: Thunderbird stopped working
creator: tweachison
content: Thunderbird has worked great for a couple of years. Recently, I kept getting the “Retry” prompt...sometimes two or three times before it would download my email from the server (windstream.net). Now I get nothing. It still goes through the "connecting...blah blah blah but nothing happens. Going to the windstream.net site works but sucks. Any help or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

title: address book disappeared
creator: michaelblitchtein
content:
Dear Thunderbird team, I am using Thunderbird and Mozilla more than 25 years. It has never happened that after downloading a new version of Thunderbird my address book had disappeared. I will be most grateful if you assist me to restore it the *previous glory*.

Thank you kindly. With much gratitude, Michael.

title: Password forgotten... almost
creator: info13438
content: I've set a password for Mozilla Thunderbird on my Laptop. I tougth I've set the same I have on my other PC, unfortunately it wasn't. I've wroted two times the same wrong password during the setting step. Now I'm out of my mail on my laptop, witch is a big problem for me. I've tried to delete it with the guide at this link https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/password-principale-thunderbird#w_reimpostare-una-password-principale-dimenticata-o-persa , but it'doesn't work. I've also tried to delete the app btu still not works... Can someone help me?
